synopsis.text:
Disguised as a young man for her safety, Chizuru Yukimura embarks on a perilous journey to the bustling city of Kyoto in search of her missing father, a renowned doctor. Upon her arrival, she finds herself entangled in a vicious battle between the enigmatic Shinsengumi and formidable demon warriors. Taken captive by the Shinsengumi, Chizuru discovers that this elite samurai group has been acquainted with her father and shares her desire to find him, albeit for different reasons.

In the midst of political turmoil and escalating conflicts, Chizuru must navigate the complex world of the Shinsengumi, forming unbreakable bonds with its dashing members while uncovering secrets that will forever alter their lives. As the search for her father continues, Chizuru finds herself drawn into a dangerous web of mysteries, supernatural creatures, and historical events that will ultimately shape the fate of Japan. With the Shinsengumi as her only allies, Chizuru must rely on their strength and determination to uncover the truth and reunite with her father.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
